name: Training Deck Alpha
description:
Every operative needs to undergo basic training, to get familiar with their movement and their equipment. These sims will help prepare you for the field ahead…

Players take on the mantle of an operative for an unspecified agency training their agents in a digital testing ground. They must prove their abilities in both movement and aiming to ensure their missions are successful.

The game should be quick on the draw by introducing a player to the essentials of movement and gunplay and allowing them to master such foundational skills quickly. The game should not have any unorthodox elements that drastically change player expectations in regards to similar games in other genres, controls and mechanics should feel natural. 

  • There is a training room which is set in a  ‘virtual reality space that contains a hub room for the player and access to 3 simulations (or “sims” for short) to undergo mini-missions dealing with movement, shooting, or both.
  • There is a usage of a sci-fi firearm with hit-scan elements for the shooting of targets and enemies. Three-degree character movement (Jump, Standing, Crouch, Dash).
  • In order to be a true agent one must master their tools, a timer ensures a bare minimum the player must challenge themselves to beat.
  • Health Pickups to restore lost HP.
  • A viral-themed environment with its own unique boss hiding somewhere in one of the three sims. Are you prepared?
